definition: player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I want players to enjoy the 'aha!' of solving a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 我希望玩家能享受解決一個謎題後“啊哈”的感覺。

sentences.english: But unless you get paid to play videogames, you’re kind of not accomplishing stuff.
sentences.chinese: 但除非你是職業玩家，你什麼也沒實現。

sentences.english: There were no entrances or exits, and players could only leave by hearthing out;
sentences.chinese: 既沒有入口也沒有出口，玩家只能爐石出去。

sentences.english: Players can also fine-tune their characters' clothing, size and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 玩家也能自由調整他們角色的服飾，體型和外表。

sentences.english: The focus within the game is for the player to investigate the activity of an group of cultist.
sentences.chinese: 玩家的任務是要調查某異教的組織的活動。

sentences.english: So as to avoid the operation of the strangeness players.
sentences.chinese: 從而避免了玩家操作上的陌生感。

sentences.english: After a player's wrap-up step is over, the next player begins his or her start phase.
sentences.chinese: 收尾工作結束後，下一個玩家開始他的開始階段。

sentences.english: But its biggest achievement by far is the sense of responsibility bestowed upon players.
sentences.chinese: 本作最大的特點就是玩家決定主人公的善惡命運。

sentences.english: Player must shoot the attackers of zombi .
sentences.chinese: 玩家必須射殺那些喪屍。

sentences.english: Bladeling PCs may be any non-chaotic alignment.
sentences.chinese: 刀鋒怪玩家可以成爲任何非混亂陣營。

sentences.english: Slowing abilities and spells will no longer decrease the speed of a player when traveling by Gryphon.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐獅鷲時，減速魔法和效果不再會降低玩家的速度。

sentences.english: Isn't there a problem in one of the players owning the scorecard that everybody uses?
sentences.chinese: 一位玩家持有衆人使用的記分卡，這難道沒有問題麼？

sentences.english: When the player tilts or moves the phone, the helicopter changes direction accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 當玩家傾斜或移動手機時，直升飛機也會地飛行方向。

sentences.english: Myth is a game very popular among players.
sentences.chinese: 封神榜是一款很受玩家歡迎的遊戲。

sentences.english: Players can be at ease use will not be found.
sentences.chinese: 玩家可以放心使用不會被發現。

sentences.english: Multiplayer Spades, Backgammon, Hearts, Checkers, and Reversi.
sentences.chinese: 多玩家黑桃王，雙陸棋，紅心大戰，跳棋和翻轉棋。

definition: to make an in-app purchase in a game
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
(video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
attached externally (e.g. fuel tank)/plug-in/add-on/special software used to cheat in an online game
online game/abbr. for 網絡遊戲|网络游戏
to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)
mobile game/abbr. for 手機遊戲|手机游戏
to start the servers (for an online game, typically after the system has been shut down for maintenance, upgrade etc)
opposing sides (in chess etc)/position (of opposing forces)
